alert.note: Alert for Carson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Carson County through 1000 PM CDT... At 925 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Panhandle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Deer and Skellytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
